## MessageAggregator.(constructor)

Constructs a new [ErrorAggregator](./ts-utils.messageaggregator.md) with an optionally specified initial set of error messages.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(errors?: string[]);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  errors | string\[\] | _(Optional)_ optional array of errors to be included in the aggregation. |
